field.label: Round
field.help: Numeric identifier by which authentication rounds are sorted.

field.label: Authentication
field.help: Authentication to perform for this round, when using Pre-Shared key make sure to define one under "VPN->IPsec->Pre-Shared Keys"

field.label: Id
field.help: IKE identity to use for authentication round. When using certificate authentication. The IKE identity must be contained in the certificate, either as the subject DN or as a subjectAltName (the identity will default to the certificateâ€™s subject DN if not specified). Refer to https://docs.strongswan.org/docs/5.9/config/identityParsing.html for details on how identities are parsed and may be configured.

field.label: EAP Id
field.help: Client EAP-Identity to use in EAP-Identity exchange and the EAP method

field.label: Certificates
field.help: List of certificate candidates to use for authentication.

field.label: Public Keys
field.help: List of raw public key candidates to use for authentication.
